title: Sex With Friends' Exes
description:
When is it okay to hookup with a friend's ex? Lauren and Jeremy debate the consequences of hooking up with an "off-limits" friend, recount the time Lauren found herself face to face with an ex hookup of Jeremy's at Coachella and talk friend boners.





Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
